name: WEIRDRO
description:
This isn't a game- its just sort of a little interactive toy I made for fun- its an interactive exercise in weird.

Weirdro uses your default mic for his audio input- If the audio is all screwed up and delayed- quit and try again- It usually screws up the first time you run it so quit and run it again-

CONTROLS:

Xbox360 or Keyboard/Mouse

Xbox360- press shit

WASD - Q - E - LClick-RClick all do shit

Use your voice- LOW pitch and HIGH pitch to do thangs.
